issue.title: [C++] Refactor StreamWriter and FileWriter to have private implementations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-577](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-577). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since FileWriter is a subclass of StreamWriter, this will require a bit of work to share code between their private implementations without leaking any symbols
